items.text: angled across but drags it down too short. Hope transfers weight back slaps it through cover. So well timed that the man running across from deep cover couldn't get to it
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, FOUR runs

items.text: good length on the stumps, defended to cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run

items.text: strays on the pads, and flicked to square leg
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run

items.text: back of a length on the stumps, tucked to short midwicket
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run

items.text: fuller length and very straight, opens the face to steer it to third man
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

items.preText: SarfBD: "I don't want Tamim to replicate his early batting. To be honest, as an opener he was very limited then. Countless time he charged down only to slash a fuller length delivery straight in to the hand of thirdman fielder. I addmire this matured Tamim more. He is definitely doing justice to his talent after rediscovering himself."
items.text: tossed up on middle, turning away slightly. He plays with the turn to short midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: slightly flatter, Hope skips down the track and wrists it to mid-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: stays in his crease that time and can go back to flick this slightly short of a length, straight ball in the gap at midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: flatter on the stumps, a bit fuller too. Bravo pushes it to cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, no run

items.text: good length outside off, Bravo comes forward to defend
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, no run

items.text: tossed up on the stumps again, Bravo comes forward to defend again
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, no run

items.preText:
Bowling change. Here's Shakib

Sanyat T: "The main reason behind giving more chances to Soumya & Liton over Imrul is that the team is thinking about the future. Soumya & Liton both have a long route ahead. They reminds me the time when Imrul Kayes & Junayed Siddique fought for the opening slot with Tamim. Sorry for Imrul that, now, he's on the wrong side of 30's. "
items.text: starts with a full toss and Hope doesn't miss out. Swats this across the line and sends it screaming to the midwicket boundary
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, FOUR runs

items.text: better length, flatter on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: good length, flatter on the stumps. He comes forward to defend
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: drags it slightly short, and Hope, who had stayed in his crease, goes deep inside to flick it to midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 2 runs

items.text: nicely tossed up outside off, and he unleashes a big, booming drive but doesn't connect fully. Gets it off the inside half of the bat to long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.text: short and wide outside off, but Bravo misses out. Went back and across to slash this through the off side but the ball goes under his bat
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Bravo, no run

items.text: dismissed dances down the track, gets to the pitch of hte ball and hits it over mid-off an dto the fence
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, FOUR runs

items.text: fuller on the stumps, he comes on the front foot and works it to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: past the outside edge pitched fuller, drawing him forward, and spins past the bat
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, no run

items.text: beaten again, and appreciable turn that time. pitched on a length again, and he went for the big heave over cow corner. Hadn't got to the pitch of the ball and it spins past his bat
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, no run

items.text: stays back to nudge this to square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, no run

items.text: gets of the mark by working it to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, 1 run

items.preText: Some thoughts on Bravo - his ODI comeback has been less than underwhelming so far. He's not managed to score quickly enough, and that has put pressure on those batting with him.
items.text: edge goes through slip for four too short, and he goes back and across to cut powerfully. Gets an outside edge that goes just past the keeper and into the third man fence.
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Bravo, FOUR runs

items.text: comes forward to push it to long-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Bravo, 1 run
